# Hej! 👋🏽 
I am Taimur Khan, a Data Scientist at the [Helmholtz-Center for Environmental Research (UFZ)](https://www.ufz.de/index.php?en=49404). Combining advances in ML/AI and remote sensing, I aid partnered researchers and engineers in creating Digital Twin and AI systems that can replicate, monitor, and predict the Earth's dynamic processes using modern methods in software engineering, earth observation, and computational modelling. I am also the founder of [Adsata](https://adsata.com), a startup that uses AI to convert webcams into secure eye trackers that track user attention and engagement in digital content.

## About Me

🌎 **Academic Background:** Geosciences and Physics (Undergraduate) @ [Skidmore College](https://www.skidmore.edu), Earth System Data Science and Remote Sensing (Graduate, ongoing) @ [University of Leipzig](https://www.uni-leipzig.de).

🔬 **Research Enthusiast:** Unraveling Earth's secrets through numerical and statistical models.

💻 **Backend Devotee:** Crafting robust and efficient systems.

🌐 **Web Wizard:** Translating complex computations into user-friendly interfaces.

📊 **AI Whisperer:** Transforming raw data into meaningful models.

👨🏻‍🏫 **Knowledge Sharer:** Giving workshops and courses on cool methods.
